name: Baked Potato Soup
comments: You are guaranteed to get praise for this soup
ingredients: 6 large Russet potatoes, peeled and cut into 1/2" cubes
toppings: shredded Cheddar cheese, chopped chives, sour cream, cooked and crumbled bacon
instructions: Combine all ingredients in crockpot except whipping cream and toppings. Cover and cook on Low 8 hours.
Mash mixture until potatoes are coarsely chopped and soup is slightly thickened; stir in whipping cream and serve with toppings.
